storyInfo: Amiya learns of a white-haired Sarkaz who looks similar to Theresa from Self-Salvation Corps member Rockrock. Aboveground, Horn notices an unusual change in the Dublinn soldiers' routine.

attributes.content: 3:22 P.M. \ Overcast
Underground structure, Sudean Borough, Londinium
I don't think this is a very smart decision.
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: Rockrock, we don't have enough hands. There are many places above us where people can hide, and we still haven't checked at least a third of Sudean.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: You know Harmo and the gang are getting ready for the move already. In a couple days, they will be leaving this place, and so will the commander.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: When that happens, even if our team stays, our chances of rescuing anyone will be slim.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: That's no reason for them to join us.
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: They aren't joining us... They're cooperating with us.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Didn't you hear the commander? They're friends of a friend. We accepted our friend's request and helped them enter Londinium, and they're here now.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: And if they can help us look for people...
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: They can rest up in our hideout. That's the commander's order.
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: And once they're done resting up, they'll leave this place. I'll escort them to somewhere safe aboveground, and that'll be the end of it.
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: Why can't we ask them if they're willing to stay for a short while? It'll just be a small favor. They might not turn us down.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: You know why. I told you.
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: Er...
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: The commander thinks they can be trusted. There has to be a reason for that, so I'll stop questioning their motives.
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: But I also don't want our men dragged into needless danger.
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: Why do you think what they're doing is dangerous?
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: What do you think they're doing here?
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: They sneaked into Londinium with a bunch of highly skilled Sarkaz, and they're making an enemy of those other Sarkaz... Feist, we're Victorians. We're used to this.
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: You're talking about the lords fighting day in and day out outside Londinium.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Ever since we were born, they've been fighting amongst themselves to no end. If it wasn't because of all their infighting, our homes wouldn't have become a Sarkaz backyard.
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: It's tiring enough trying to take back our homes... The Sarkaz want to fight on our lands, and not only is there nothing we can do about it, it has nothing to do with us.
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: But what if they can really stop the Sarkaz occupying the city?
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Maybe you think they're here to snatch the crown, but the way I see it, we have a common enemy.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: I'm not so confident to think that we can take control of the situation. Not like you.
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: The Sarkaz... they're nothing like you think. They're that good at pretending.
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: The day my dad was executed, I spotted a girl in the distance... The executioner called her 'Your Majesty.'
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: That was when I found out what the king of the devils actually looked like.
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: You never told me that before.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Because I never saw the need to.
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: I'm telling you this now because... I want you to know we can't let ourselves be deceived by looks.
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: Even though the Sarkaz woman had a flawless, unblemished appearance, even if she put up a look of pity for an old Londinier worker, totally unknown to her, I will never forget...
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: She is the one who led the Sarkaz and killed my father... and countless more Victorians...! She's the Lord of Fiends!
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: Uhh... Miss Amiya?
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Mr. Feist, Miss Rockrock...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: That's all I have to say, Captain. I will head aboveground and continue our search mission. You... You should really give what I said some thought.
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: Sorry, Miss Amiya, Doctor... Um, I need to help Harmo tune his equipment... so please excuse me too.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Doctor, the Sarkaz that Miss Rockrock mentioned...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: It's a white-haired woman with a compassionate look... and the Sarkaz called her 'Your Majesty.'
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Doctor, you might have forgotten, but I...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I will never forget even the tiniest detail about her expression or anything she said to me.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I know it's impossible.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But I...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Dr.{@nickname}, from today onwards, you have the permission to access the following files.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: Some of the information in these files will be of interest to you—
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: Whether it's information about her, or information on the powers that Amiya has inherited.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.options: You talked about this, and you didn

attributes.content: At this point in time, trust is meaningless.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: I can't deny the importance you hold to Amiya, and the thing she needs most in this Londinium operation is your assistance.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: Doctor...
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: No matter what you two find in Londinium, you have to face it with her, together.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: I know you can do it.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: Right... I need to stay calm.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I was almost going to chase after Miss Rockrock, to ask her who she saw.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But... that could further fuel her misunderstanding about us.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Yeah... Doctor, I'm feeling better now.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: You might've heard a little about the past from Dr. Kal'tsit before we came to Londinium.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But there are some things that I haven't had the chance to talk to you about.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Actually, for a very long time after that incident, I dreamt about you two a lot.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: In my dreams, you never talked. You just watched over me in silence.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: It was like that night out on the barrens. You held my hand silently, and I could sleep soundly.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I was able to feel you... I knew you were just asleep. Dr.{@nickname}, you might have been away for a little while, but you were there with me still.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But she's... not the same.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: She told me a lot of things in my dreams. From the fate of every single Sarkaz at Rhodes Island to if I wasn't sleeping well, if it was cold...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: She warned me about lots of things. It was like she was right there by my side.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: The more that happened... The more that happened, the more it struck home that... she has left us.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: Trust your feelings.;......;You know her better than anyone.

attributes.content: There is so, so much that she didn't want to leave behind and so many people and things that she kept thinking about. Us, Dr. Kal'tsit, Rhodes Island, and the Sarkaz...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: If... If she was actually alive, would she not come back to us?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Right, she wouldn't just abandon us.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: And she wasn't the kind of person who would let Theresis invade Victoria... She wouldn't be able to bear seeing the Sarkaz start this unjust war.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: You mean that Rockrock might have seen another Sarkaz who looked like her?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: It's true. That's possible.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: It's... a very cruel method.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Death is a very serious matter to the Sarkaz, much more so than any other race. The souls of a Sarkaz who passed eventually returns to her whole tribe. It's the greatest comfort to the Sarkaz, after a lifetime of hardship.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Doctor, you witnessed the passing of Patriot. It was a matter of dignity and pride. It was the last time a man saw his own fate.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: The silence of death gave him an answer, and this answer can forgive everything about him.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: No Sarkaz should ever have that final peace stolen from them... Especially her, who gave everything to the Sarkaz.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Doctor, do you remember what I said at the port?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I know what emotion has taken hold of Londinium. It's anger. Sarkaz anger.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: And it's not just me who can hear it, this anger is so strong that all Sarkaz can hear it.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Even a Wendigo altar can't give rise to such a strong resonance. It's like someone turned the Sarkaz's centuries-old burning anger into an actual, raging fire.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: If no one puts a stop to it, sooner or later, it will burn through Londinium's skies and spread, burning everything in its path.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: That's why we need to get close to it as soon as we can to find out what the source of the fire that's engulfing everything actually is.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: You can see it, Doctor. Right, emotionally... I'm not like I was before.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: The one ready to dive into the fire isn't the leader of Rhodes Island. Probably not the successor they keep talking about, either... It's Amiya.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: This is what I want. It's the answer I'm looking for, as an individual.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: And it's true... I'm also a little scared.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I'm afraid of that answer. I don't want to see Dr. Kal'tsit and everyone else have their hearts shattered.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Yeah, right. There's me, too. If it's really her... I don't even want to imagine what that might mean...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But this is something I must face. There is no other way forward.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: I will face it with you.;We will walk this path together.

attributes.content: Thank you, Doctor...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Just knowing you're here by my side gives me the courage to keep going.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I'll go talk to Commander Clovisia now, to propose a partnership.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Their friends were taken prisoner by the Sarkaz, and they need more manpower to rescue them.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: We also need their help.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Going by our original plan, we should already have rendezvoused with our contact, the Messenger lady. We need to figure out whether she's safe or not.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: She's a friend of the Self-Salvation Corps. Maybe their commander could help us find her.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: That's not to mention their guidance will make our journey into Central Londinium much more likely to succeed.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Rhodes Island will prove to the Londinium Citizens' Self-Salvation Corps that we are not here for the Sarkaz crown.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Horn, the Dublinn forces are acting really strange!
attributes.name: Robben

attributes.content: They're going... that way.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: I thought Sarkaz troops were guarding that area, though? Dublinn would never have dared to go anywhere close with them around!
attributes.name: Robben

attributes.content: They must have their reasons. I'll tail them.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Isn't that a tad risky...? They have ten times our manpower.
attributes.name: Robben

attributes.content: And that's why I'm going alone.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: The rest of you will continue as planned. Look for resources at their stronghold. They've just started relocating. Most likely, they haven't had the time to haul their supplies away too.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Be careful out there.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: You too!
attributes.name: Robben

attributes.content: Hey, get a move on. The commander doesn't want us to waste another second!
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier

attributes.content: I know you don't want to be doing this. Who does? Those stinking devils, treating us like a bunch of mercenaries!
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier

attributes.content: But don't let me see you slacking off. You better not embarrass the commander in front of the Sarkaz.
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier

attributes.content: Why aren't you keeping up? M-611, respond!
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier

attributes.content: W-What's going on?
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier

attributes.content: Don't move.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: I-It's you...! M-601, call for... argh!
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier

attributes.content: Don't speak either.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Urgh...
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier

attributes.content: Hand over the comms.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Alright, now you can speak.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: *Cough*, *cough* *cough*...
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier

attributes.content: Tell me, what are you helping the Sarkaz with?
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: L-Like I'd tell you, you wicked Victorian wolf...
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier

attributes.content: Let me think... How did Dublinn treat the Victorians who weren't willing to talk?
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: They were hanged on a pulley a dozen meters off the ground, right?
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Too bad, I don't know how to make stone columns with Arts. I don't have an easy way to send someone so high up.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Y-You wouldn't...
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier

attributes.content: Wouldn't I?
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: True, if I were as shameless as your commander, watching my people sacrifice themselves in County Hillock one by one wouldn't have bothered me one bit.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: How about this, then? I'll tie you up, and then dump you in some abandoned factory.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: There are lots of factories like that around here. It wouldn't take that long to look through each of them one by one.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Now that's how I do things, right? It's thanks to my patience that I could rescue some of those poor soldiers from you people.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: I only hope that your commanding officer will find you too before you die alone, despairing in the darkness...
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: No... No! My commander wouldn't...
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier

attributes.content: Please, spare me. What do you want to know? I just follow orders. I don't understand the complicated stuff!
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier

attributes.content: Yes, I'm quite sure of that. That Sarkaz commander is much smarter than your commanding officer.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Whatever he is scheming, Mandragora will never figure it out, and you lads will have to keep letting the Sarkaz toy with you.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Fine, you just need to tell me where you are headed, then. I'll figure out the rest myself.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: If you're back, why didn't you pay me a visit sooner?
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: You have too many guests.
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen?

attributes.content: Ah, I forgot. You didn't want to see the Confessarius Messenger.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: If he found out that I came back to Londinium, wouldn't that spell the end of my leisurely days?
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen?

attributes.content: Even then, you didn't have to wait for Hoederer to leave before you show yourself. He's my man. He won't ever report your presence to the court.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Oh, he's your man? Don't fool yourself; you don't trust anyone.
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen?

attributes.content: If you really trusted him, you could've just hollered my name. You're the one who decided to wait till the Dublinn Feline and your mercenary friends were gone before saying hello.
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen?

attributes.content: Let's set this topic aside. You helped me lure the Dublinn forces into position this morning. I owe you this one.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Oh... It's no big deal. Besides, I got a little surprise out of it.
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen?

attributes.content: A surprise...? For you, of all people, to use that word, I'm guessing you found more than a few rebels.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Hm... Did you meet the Rhodes Islanders down there?
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: There's more. Not only did I run into them, they were the ones who 'rescued' me from Dublinn and escorted me to the city walls.
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen?

attributes.content: If it wasn't for how antsy you were to test your prized new toy, such that I had to be 'blown up' in front of them, perhaps I could've followed them a little longer.
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen?

attributes.content: I actually wanted to have a good chat with her.
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen?

attributes.content: What if I tell you there's still a chance?
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Another job for me? Didn't you send the Dublinns and the mercenaries to guard the temporary brig? I thought you had everything in place already, and you just had to extend an invitation?
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen?

attributes.content: I prefer writing myself a few insurance policies.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Alright, alright. You owe us one, then.
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen?

attributes.content: Uh... Did I just say 'us?'
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen?

attributes.content: No matter. There's no one else here.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Truth be told, we don't really want to stay here for much longer... That narcissistic old man with the chalice is almost here, isn't he?
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen?

attributes.content: Don't tell him about us.
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen?

attributes.content: Of course... I have yet to repay your kindness, after all.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Another note... You should stop masquerading as a dead man. Not only might you find your cover blown, it also... makes me feel uneasy.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Gah, we almost forgot. What an upstanding Sarkaz you are, right, pupil of Theresis?
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen?

attributes.content: Relax. The next time we meet, I won't be 'Mr. Thomas' anymore.
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen?
